Mirror Readme

* Design
	Mirror, program written in java compares two images on the internet. The program first downloads the two image files from the given links and then compares. 
* Dependencies
      java jdk 1.6
* Usage
	Run the program then enter two valid image links in spaces provided. Then click Load to download file and then click compare to compare the images
